Summary: observed bright orange light directly above, triangle object, no sound.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around May 16th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas in back yard at around 12:00 midnight and noticed a bright orange light in sky directly above my position. Above the light I could make out a triangle shape dark gray object. The object was moving at a moderate speed, (maybe a little faster than a small aircraft), going west to east in a straight line making no noise. I did return to my house to grab my camera but object had disappeared, which was odd as I was only gone for seconds.
